snippet: The Islamic State extremist group claimed Wednesday to be holding a Norwegian man and a Chinese consultant hostage and demanded ransoms for their release.
abstract: Islamic State publishes photos of alleged hostages Ole Johan Grimsgaard-Osfstad of Norway and Chinese man Fan Jinghui and demands ransoms in current issue of its online magazine; kidnapping of Norwegian man is confirmed by country's prime minister.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State extremist group claimed Wednesday to be holding a Norwegian man and a Chinese consultant hostage and demanded ransoms for their release.

headline.main: ISIS Says It Has Foreign Hostages
headline.print_headline: Middle East; ISIS Says It Has Foreign Hostages

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
